Nibbs.name: Nibbs
description: A young warrior from another galaxy. Her cards focus on positioning using <c=keyword>backtrackable instant movement</c> and <c=keyword>time stop</c>.

Ix.name: Ix
description: An ecoterrorist. His cards allow you to multiply your attacks at the risk of hitting your own ship.

prism.name: prism
prism.description:
Instead of destroying the prism, attacks can refract or even be copied based on their direction:
- Attacks at the <c=keyword>pointy end</c> destroy the prism.
- Attacks at the <c=keyword>sides</c> are refracted through the flat end
- Attacks at the <c=keyword>flat end</c> are copied and refracted in the other 3 cardinal directions. <c=faint>(Payback attacks just refract through instead.)</c>

omniprism.name: omniprism
omniprism.description: Instead of destroying the prism, attacks are copied and refracted in the other 3 cardinal directions. <c=faint>(Payback attacks just refract through instead.)</c>

backtrackMove.name: Reversible move
backtrackMove.description: Instantly move <c=keyword>{{Amount}}</c> spaces in this direction and gain <c=status>BACKTRACK</c> of the opposite direction equal to the distance moved.

backtrackMoveLeft.name: Reversible move left
backtrackMoveLeft.description: Instantly move <c=keyword>{{Amount}}</c> spaces to the <c=keyword>LEFT</c> and gain <c=status>BACKTRACK RIGHT</c> equal to the distance moved.

backtrackMoveRight.name: Reversible move right
backtrackMoveRight.description: Instantly move <c=keyword>{{Amount}}</c> spaces to the <c=keyword>RIGHT</c> and gain <c=status>BACKTRACK LEFT</c> equal to the distance moved.

backtrackMoveRandom.name: Reversible move random
backtrackMoveRandom.description: Instantly move <c=keyword>{{Amount}}</c> spaces in a random direction and gain <c=status>BACKTRACK</c> of the opposite direction equal to the distance moved.

description.directional: Turn around all <c=midrow>objects</c> <c=keyword>{{Dir}}</c> of your missile bay.

Backflip.name: backflip
Backflip.description: All cards with flippable actions, such as <c=action>move</c>, are <c=cardtrait>flippable</c> for {0} turns.

Smokescreen.name: blur
Smokescreen.description: Whenever this ship moves, it gains {0} <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 at end of turn.

BacktrackLeft.name: backtrack left
BacktrackLeft.description: Lets you move left with {0}. Costs 1 backtrack left per move. <c=downside>Not affected by HERMES BOOTS. Goes away at end of turn.

BacktrackRight.name: backtrack right
BacktrackRight.description: Lets you move right with {0}. Costs 1 backtrack right per move. <c=downside>Not affected by HERMES BOOTS. Goes away at end of turn.

BacktrackAutododgeLeft.name: reversible autododge left
BacktrackAutododgeLeft.description: If fired on, will completely move out of the way <c=keyword>LEFT</c> and gain <c=status>BACKTRACK RIGHT</c> equal to the distance moved. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 every time it triggers. Goes away at start of next turn.</c>.

BacktrackAutododgeRight.name: reversible autododge right
BacktrackAutododgeRight.description: If fired on, will completely move out of the way <c=keyword>RIGHT</c> and gain <c=status>BACKTRACK LEFT</c> equal to the distance moved. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 every time it triggers. Goes away at start of next turn.</c>.

SafetyShield.name: safety shield
SafetyShield.description: Block up to {0} incoming damage. <c=downside>Goes away at end of turn.</c>

Fracture.name: fracture
Fracture.description: At the beginning of your next turn, the opposing ship gains {0} <c=status>SAFETY SHIELD</c>.

ChocolateSurpriseEgg.name: CHOCOLATE MONSTER EGG
ChocolateSurpriseEgg.description: At the end of every turn, if you gained any <c=status>HEAT</c> that turn, gain <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> equal to your <c=status>HEAT</c>.

DragonfireCandle.name: DRAGONFIRE CANDLE
DragonfireCandle.description: Whenever you <c=action>stun</c> an intent or cause a <c=action>total stun</c>, the enemy loses 1 hull.

EyeOfCoba.name: EYE OF COBA
EyeOfCoba.description: Your first <c=action>non-reversible move</c> each turn becomes a <c=keyword>reversible</c> move.

GalacticNewsCoverage.name: CHANNEL 7 COVERAGE
GalacticNewsCoverage.description: Upon reaching {{Amount}} <c=status>BACKFLIP</c>, lose {{Amount}} backflip, gain 1 <c=status>TABLE FLIP</c> and convert all current and future backflip to <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>.

QuantumEngines.name: QUANTUM ENGINES
QuantumEngines.description: Whenever you gain <c=status>BACKTRACK LEFT/RIGHT</c> or any kind of <c=status>AUTODODGE</c>, gain 1 more.

SugarRush.name: SUGAR RUSH
SugarRush.description: Gain 1 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> and draw <c=card>+1 card</c> every turn. <c=downside>At the end of each turn, reversible move 1 in a random direction.</c>

FledgelingOrb.name: FLEDGELING'S ORB
FledgelingOrb.description: You cannot <c=action>OVERHEAT</c> while you have <c=status>TIMESTOP</c>. <c=downside>Your backtrack movement doesn't trigger STRAFE.

DiamondCubic.name: DIAMOND CUBIC
DiamondCubic.description:
Attacks cannot <c=action>pierce</c>, <c=parttrait>weaken</c>, <c=parttrait>brittle</c> or <c=parttrait>armor</c> your ship.
Your <c=status>payback</c> attacks are piercing.

MultiFaceted.name: MULTI-FACETED
MultiFaceted.description: At start of turn, gain 1 <c=status>PERSEVERANCE</c>. <c=downside>At end of turn, lose 1 PERSEVERANCE.

GemOrbit.name: GEM ORBIT
GemOrbit.description: Three <c=midrow>prisms</c>, one of each type, will always be near your ship at the start of combat.

ConservationEffort.name: CONSERVATION EFFORT
ConservationEffort.description: Add an <c=parttrait>invincible</c>, functionless ship part randomly somewhere in the middle of your ship.

Manifesto.name: MANIFESTO
Manifesto.description: While you have 3+ <c=status>FRACTURE</c>, ALL your attacks do +1 damage.

Filter.name: FILTER
Filter.description: Refracted attacks deal 1 less damage to you.

Thorite.name: THORITE
Thorite.description: During the enemy turn, all enemy parts are <c=parttrait>brittle</c>.

SolarTreeOld.name: SOLAR TREE
SolarTreeOld.description: At the start of your turn, gain 2 <c=status>SAFETY SHIELD</c> if you ended your last turn with more than 0 <c=energy>ENERGY</c>.

ManifestoOld.name: MANIFESTO
ManifestoOld.description: Prevent up to 6 damage you take DURING each of your turns. <c=faint>Hull loss actions are unaffected.</c>

HealingCrystals.name: HEALING CRYSTALS
HealingCrystals.description: The first time each combat you are hit by a twice-refracted attack, <c=heal>heal</c> 2.

MultiFacetedOld.name: MULTI-FACETED
MultiFacetedOld.description: If you start your turn with <c=status>FRACTURE</c>, gain a <c=card>Dark Side</c>.

description.A: On draw, <c=downside>immediately</c> <c=action>backtrack move {{Dir}} {{Amount}} and gain 1 <c=status>temp shield</c>.

description.None: Add a <c=card>Hop</c> and a <c=card>Skip</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.
description.A: Add a <c=card>Hop A</c> and a <c=card>Skip A</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.
description.B: Gain 2 <c=status>backflip</c>. Add a <c=card>Hop</c> and a <c=card>Skip</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.

description.None: <c=keyword>Double</c> and trigger all enemy <c=status>FRACTURE</c>, then all your <c=status>FRACTURE</c>.
description.A: <c=keyword>Double</c> and trigger all enemy <c=status>FRACTURE</c>, then all your <c=status>FRACTURE</c>.
description.B: <c=keyword>Triple</c> and trigger all enemy <c=status>FRACTURE</c>, then all your <c=status>FRACTURE</c>.
